label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_002
content:
## 2026-01-03 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster_capacity: REQUESTS req | p50: 120ms p95: 250ms p99: 400ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node_utilization: REQUESTS req | p50: 50ms p95: 100ms p99: 150ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance: REQUESTS req | p50: 80ms p95: 180ms p99: 300ms | err: 0.3% (3 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction: REQUESTS req | p50: 70ms p95: 160ms p99: 280ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io: REQUESTS req | p50: 60ms p95: 140ms p99: 220ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/storage_efficiency: REQUESTS req | p50: 55ms p95: 130ms p99: 210ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/backup_verification: REQUESTS req | p50: 65ms p95: 150ms p99: 240ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/quota_enforcement: REQUESTS req | p50: 45ms p95: 110ms p99: 180ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/ingest: REQUESTS req | p50: 50ms p95: 120ms p99: 200ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/reliability: REQUESTS req | p50: 40ms p95: 100ms p99: 160ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/metadata: REQUESTS req | p50: 55ms p95: 125ms p99: 210ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/maintenance: REQUESTS req | p50: 60ms p95: 140ms p99: 220ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-03: CPU 67% | Mem 74% | Disk 92% | Conns: 120 | Net: 7.0/6.7 Mbps
- stor-b-14: CPU 59% | Mem 63% | Disk 90% | Conns: 98 | Net: 5.9/5.1 Mbps
- stor-c-05: CPU 52% | Mem 69% | Disk 86% | Conns: 85 | Net: 4.6/4.2 Mbps
- meta-01: CPU 51% | Mem 83% | Disk 75% | Conns: 70 | Net: 2.4/2.0 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage: active 45 | idle 10 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 60 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-metadata: active 20 | idle 15 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 40 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-rebalance: active 3 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 15ms
- pool-io: active 25 | idle 5 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 0 | max 35 | avg_wait 10ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1,200,000

### Alerts
- [WARNING] high node utilization on stor-a-03: 95.1%
- [INFO] kernel security patches applied on stor-b-14 and stor-c-05
- [NOTICE] quota increase approved for tenant 'etl-warehouse'
- [INFO] manifest backlog during compaction wave: 2100 backlog

### Deployments & Changes
- Kernel security patches applied on two storage nodes during low-traffic window; no service impact observed
- Tenant 'etl-warehouse' quota increased by 20 TB after review
- Metadata compaction threads tuned to reduce backlog from 2,100 to under 1,500

### Events
- Completed tail end of prior day's rebalance; verified placement groups balanced within 3% target across racks
- Observed elevated manifest backlog during compaction wave; tuned metadata compaction threads and backlog returned under 1.5k
- No disk failures or disk rebuilds reported
- One node restart occurred; no service impact
- Two unhealthy OSDs identified; ongoing monitoring
- Scrub errors recorded: 9

### On-Call
- Shift: Marco L. 2 pages. 5 tickets. Status: Healthy; continuing incremental rebalancing to keep hottest nodes under 95% and watching metadata backlog
